body.p: This is a list of all commands mentioned in this book and how to find them on-line. All referenced utilities are open-source.

dl.dd: A replacement of ispell with greater word-suggestion power and support for non-ASCII input. Available at aspell.net under the GPL.
A re-write of spell for international dictionaries. Available at lasr.cs.ucla.edu/geoff/ispell.html under its own license.

Remove [most] roff control statements from a file. This utility uses heuristics instead of properly parsing its input. Originally in Version 7 AT&T UNIX (if not before?) and used heavily by the Writer's Workbench. Available under the Lucent Public License at heirloom.sourceforge.net/tools.html and under the GPL at marmaro.de/prog/deroff/.
Checks the diction of a (German or English) document. Originally in the Version 6 AT&T UNIX Writer's Workbench. A GPL version is available at www.gnu.org/s/diction.
A specialised formatter for UNIX manuals. Non-standardised. BSD licensed. Available at mdocml.bsd.lv.
The original (English-only) UNIX spell-checker distributed with Version 6 AT&T UNIX. Now BSD licensed and available at code.google.com/p/unix-spell/. Also may be emulated by ispell and aspell.
A standard POSIX.1-2008 utility for outputting parts of a file.
